title: An Apple Watch ban is looming. Here’s what it means for you.
description: The company’s latest Apple Watches have been on the market for just three months. Now, not even Apple is sure when it can sell them again.

title: Blue Origin returns to flight as Bezos reengages with his space company
description: The mission didn’t carry any people, but marked the first flight in more than a year for Blue Origin’s New Shepard rocket.

title: We spent a year talking to lonely people. Here’s what we learned.
description: We spent 2023 asking psychology experts, tech companies and users: What’s the relationship between tech use, especially social media, and loneliness?

title: Creators, porn stars turn to AI doppelgangers to keep fans entertained
description: The latest wave of AI is being built to emulate specific people, adopting their faces and speech patterns to advertise uncanny simulations the promoters say are always available and can never die.

title: Pakistan’s former leader Imran Khan uses AI to campaign from behind bars
description: Khan’s party, Tehreek-e-Insaf, deployed AI-generated audio of his voice for an online rally to circumvent a broad government crackdown on its campaign events.

title: 102 million people eligible for Google’s $630M lawsuit settlement
description: Android phone users in the U.S. will also see changes in how they download apps as Google settles an antitrust lawsuit over the high fees it charges app developers.
